title: What this blog will be about?
body:
#### Notes on possible content

- What do we want to share with the world?
> - What are we working on?
> - Acheivemnts
> - culture that is developed here
> - Events
> - Design resource collections
> - Design notice board (like WIKICFP)
- Share amongst us
> - Protocols (how to survive IDC PhD)
> - repo of personally interesting docs (gdrive link)

- What the world wants to know?
> - Recent research development 
> - Design research journalism
> - Personal 
- Sustenance
> - critique on what people have done (non domain)
